scripts.dev:init: npm install && cd web && npm install
scripts.build:web: cd web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run db:migrate:staging && wrangler versions upload --minify --env staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run db:migrate:production && wrangler deploy --minify --env production
scripts.db:migrate:development: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply entix-app-development --local --env development
scripts.db:migrate:staging: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply entix-app-staging --remote --env staging
scripts.db:migrate:production: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply entix-app-production --remote --env production
